name: SpaceShip (FlamingSparrow)
description:
Controls:

Use arrow keys to move the ship. Use up arrow to shoot.
Shoot the comets before they hit you or the border.
The border/barrier has three lives while you only have one, so be careful!
If you get hit or the barrier loses all it's hearts, you lose!

Music from Smash Ultimate

Made using the Scratch Engine!
